Author: sh3lin
Text: yeah, I told my roommate she did that and she said the same thing. she doesnt let a doctor weight her anymore, but at that moment I didnt think she would make me say it outloud. also didnt really give me a choice like "would you like to be weighted" but straight up asked me to get on the scale so I didnt really realise haha. but yeah your totally right

Author: tofu_snob
Text: I hate that doctors do shit like this. I know it will be uncomfortable and difficult, but next time literally refuse to do it. Tell him it ignites poor thoughts and is detrimental to your health. If he doesn't respect that, leave and report him.
